scripts.dev:test: PORT=__TEST_BACKEND_PORT__ DB_PORT=__TEST_PORT__ NODE_ENV=test tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.db:dev:kill: docker compose -f docker/dev/docker-compose.yml down -v && rm -rf docker/dev/postgresql-data
scripts.db:dev:reset: npm run db:dev:kill && npm run db:schema-sync && npm run db:dev:up && sleep 5 && npm run db:dev:seed
scripts.db:test:kill: docker compose -f docker/test/docker-compose.yml down -v && rm -rf docker/test/postgresql-data
scripts.db:test:reset: npm run db:test:kill && npm run db:schema-sync && npm run db:test:up
scripts.db:schema-sync: cp db/schema.sql docker/dev/postgresql-init/dump.sql && cp db/schema.sql docker/test/postgresql-init/dump.sql
